fields.name: value
fields.desc: The value represented by this radio button.

fields.name: groupValue
fields.desc: The currently selected value for a group of radio buttons.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called when the user selects this [CupertinoRadio] button.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: toggleable
fields.desc: Set to true if this radio button is allowed to be returned to an indeterminate state by selecting it again when selected.

fields.name: useCheckmarkStyle
fields.desc: Controls whether the radio displays in a checkbox style or the default iOS radio style.

fields.name: activeColor
fields.desc: The color to use when this radio button is selected.

fields.name: inactiveColor
fields.desc: The color to use when this radio button is not selected.

fields.name: fillColor
fields.desc: The color that fills the inner circle of the radio button when selected.

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color for the radio's border when it has the input focus.

nodes.name: Toggle Support
desc: toggleable defaults to false. When set to true, clicking an active radio button will call back null data, supporting the need for toggling between selected and unselected states.
